property.name: Text
property.value: Auto Once per turn When your Battle Card attacks a Leader Card, if the attacking card has 15000 or more power, draw 1 card. Awaken When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 2 cards and flip this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card. Activate:Main: Place 1 card from your hand in the Drop Area : Choose this card or 1 of your Battle Cards. It gains Double Strike for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent This card can attack Battle Cards in Active Mode. Awaken When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 2 cards and flip this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: This card can attack Battle Cards in Active Mode. Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card. If this card attacks a Battle Card, it gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto When this card attacks, it gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn. Awaken When your life is at 4 or less : You may draw 2 cards and flip this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card, and this card gains +5000 power for the duration of this turn. Auto: Once per turn When your opponent activates Blocker, you may place 1 red card from your hand into the Drop Area. If you do so, negate that Blocker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evolve 2(RRR): Champa. Triple Strike. Auto: When you play this card, choose all of your oponent's Battle Cards in the Battle Area with 15000 or less power and KO them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto When you Combo with this card, choose 1 of your attacking cards. It gains Double Strike (This card inflicts 2 damage instead of 1 when attacking) for the duration of the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto When you play a red ?Alien?, it gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto When you play this card, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck. Choose up to 1 red Champa among them and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dual Attack. Auto When this card attacks, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. Choose up to 1 ?Alien? with power 15000 or less among them and play it. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto When you play this card, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. Choose up to 1 red ?Alien? among them and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto When you Combo with this card, if your Leader Card is red and your life is 4 or lower, draw 1 card and add +10000 to this card's Combo for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evolve 2(RRR): Hit. Double Strike. Auto: When a card evolves into this card, inflict 2 damage to your opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evolve 1(RR): Cabba. Double Strike. Auto When a card evolves into this card, switch this card to Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto When this card attacks, you may choose 1 card from your life and add it to your hand. If you do so, this card gains +10000 power and Double Strike (This card inflicts 2 damage instead of 1 when attacking) for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evolve 1(RR): Frost. Double Strike. Auto When this card attacks a Battle Card, KO that card after the battle. Then, if your opponent's Leader Card has 10000 or less power, inflict 1 damage to your opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main 2: Look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, choose one Frost with Evolve among them and Evolve this card into it. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent This Card can attack Battle Cards that are in Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: This card cannot be KO-ed in battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double Strike. Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 Supreme Kai's Attendant from your deck and play it. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: This card cannot attack Battle Card with 15000 or more power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main: Choose any number of opponent Battle Cards of which the total power adds up to 30000 or less and KO those cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Counter:Attack: Negate the attack. Then, you may switch up to 1 of your Battle Cards to Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main: Choose 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with 12000 or less power in the Battle Area and KO that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Battle: Choose up to 1 of your red cards. It gains +6000 power for the duration of the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main: Once per turn Choose 1 card from your life and add it to your hand : This card gains Critical for the duration of the turn. Awaken.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main: Once per turn Choose 1 card from your life and add it to your hand : This card gains Critical for the duration of the turn. If you have 7 or more blue energy, this card also gains +10000 power for the duration of the turn. Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto When this card attacks, if you have 3 or more energy, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 2 or less and KO it. Awaken.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card. Then choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with an energy cost of 3 or less and KO it. Activate:Main 16, Switch this card to Rest Mode : You win this game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks, it gains +1000 for each 1 energy you have, for the duration of the turn. Awaken.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: When you have 7 or more energy, this card gains Dual Attack. Auto: Once per turn When this card attacks, draw 1 card. Then, this card gains +1000 power for each 1 energy you have for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evolve 3(BBB) Son Goku: Double Strike. Your opponent cannot activate Counter against this card's attack and cannot activate Blocker during this card's attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Critical. Permanent: During your turn, if you have 5 or more energy, this card gains +10000 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck. Choose up to 1 blue Son Goku among them and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evolve 2(BBB): Vegeta. Dual Attack. Critical. Auto: When a card evolves into this card, choose up to 1 opponent Battle Card with Blocker and return it to their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, choose up to 1 Whis with an energy cost of 4 or lower from your deck and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Triple Strike. When this card attacks a Leader Card, your oponent may choose 2 cards from their hand and place them in the Drop Area. If they don't, choose all of your oponent's Battle Cards and energy. Place them in the Drop Area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Double Strike. Auto: When you play this card, if you have 5 or more energy, choose up to 1opponent Battle Card and KO that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Quadruple Strike. Permanent: This card's attack and skill cannot be negated. Auto: When you play this card, if your Leader Card is Beerus, after your current turn ends, take another turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, add 1 card to your energy from the top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you Combo with this card, if your Leader Card is blue and your life is 4 or less, draw 1 card and add +10000 to this card's Combo for the duration of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you Combo with this card, choose 1 card in your opponent's Combo Area and return it to their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, if you do not have any Battle Cards other than this card in play, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards. Place that card on top of the opponent's deck, and all cards that were under it in the Drop Area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main: During this turn, you may activate your Leader Card's Awaken even if you have 5 or more life. Then, choose up to 4 of your energy and switch them to Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main: Choose up to 1 card from your hand, and add it to your energy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Battle: Choose up to 1 of your cards. It gains +5000 power for the duration of the turn. Then, choose up to 2 of your energy and switch them to Active Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Permanent: This card cannot attack Battle Cards. Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card. Then, both players choose 1 card from their hand and 1 card from their Battle Area, and place those cards in their Drop Areas.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks, if you have more life than your opponent, draw 1 card. Awaken.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card. Activate:Main: Once per turn 6: Choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards in the Battle Area and KO them.

property.value: Auto: When you play this card, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck. Choose up to 1 Krillin among them and add it to your hand.

property.value: Auto: When this card attacks a Leader Card, your opponent chooses 1 card from their hand and places it in the Drop Area.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck and add 1 green Broly among them to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, you may place 1 card from your hand in the Drop Area. If you do so, choose and activate 1 {Broly's Ring} from your deck. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When this card is placed in the Drop Area from the Battle Area, if your Leader Card is Broly, you may place 1 card from your hand in the Drop Area. If you do, play this card.

property.value: Activate:Battle: Choose up to 1 of your Battle Cards. It gains +10000 power and Revenge

property.name: Text
property.value: Field. Permanent: Your hand is not affected by your Leader Card Broly's skill.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main: Choose up to 1 opponent Battle Card with an energy cost of 2 or less and KO that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main: Once per turn Place 1 of your ?Frieza's Army? Battle Cards in the Drop Area : Choose up to 1 of your energy and switch it to Active Mode. Then, draw 1 card. Awaken.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: At the end of your turn, choose up to 1 of your Battle Cards and switch it to Active Mode. Awaken.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: At the end of your turn, choose up to 2 of your Battle Cards and switch them to Active Mode. Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main: Once per turn Flip over 1 face-down card in your life : If the flipped card is ?Ginyu Force? but not Ginyu, play that card. If not, add it to your hand. Awaken.

property.name: Text
property.value: Activate:Main: Once per turn Add 1 card from your life to your hand : This card gains Double Strike for the duration of the turn. If there are 2 or more of your ?Ginyu Force? in play, this card gains an additional +5000 power for the duration of the turn. Auto: When this card attacks, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evolve 4(YY) Frieza. Triple Strike. Auto: When a card evolves into this card, place all Rest Mode Battle Cards except for this card in the Drop Area. Then, choose all Active Mode Battle Cards except for this card and switch them to Rest Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blocker. Triple Strike. Auto: When you activate this card's Blocker, switch this card to Active Mode after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Evolve 1(YY): Frieza. Double Strike. Auto: When a card evolves into this card, choose all of your opponent's cards with Blocker and switch them to Rest Mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Auto: When you play this card, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. Choose up to 1 Frieza's Army among them with an energy cost of 2 or less and add it to your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dual Strike. Auto: When you play this card, you may place 1 card from your hand in the Drop Area. If you do so, choose up to 2 opponent Rest Mode Battle Cards and KO those cards. Then, this card gains Double Strike for the duration of the turn.
